name: Grand War: Rome
description:
Spanning 2000 years of history, build your own empire in Rome!

Commander, use your extraordinary wisdom to start an exciting journey of legendary battles! During this journey, Caesar, Scipio, Hannibal... the legendary generals will fight for you! Rome, Samnium, Epirus, Carthage, you can choose from different nations! Recast the glory of war, and the empire will rise because of you!
『General』
「Diverse Legendary Generals」
Caesar, Scipio, Hannibal, Pyrrhus... Choose your legendary generals and create your own era!
「General Growth」Through continuous battles, your generals will continue to grow to obtain outstanding abilities and show extraordinary dominance on the battlefield!
「General skill」Every general has a wealth of skills, and different skill combinations may produce unexpected and amazing effects! The secret is waiting for you to explore!
『Battle』
「Diverse Campaign」Rome, Samnium, Epirus, Carthage. Different choices will open a different history! Fighting for the rise of Rome, or blazing a different path, is up to your wisdom. Write your own history and create a unique empire glory!
「Return To The Ancient War」 Punic Wars, Pyrrhic Wars, Samnite Wars... The ancient wars will bring a brand new experience! You can not only experience the surging battles of ancient wars, but also feel the brilliance of history under different choices! Everything is no longer doomed! The ancient war will open up new glory, please do your best!
『troop』
「Unique Troops」 archer, cavalry, war elephant, ballista, catapult, warship... The extremely rich types of troops allow you to use a wealth of strategies. Let the enemy surrender at your feet!
「Troop Growth」A battle-tested soldier will have extraordinary combat effectiveness! Hone your troops on the battlefield, they will get a level upgrade, and the situation on the battlefield may change as a result!
「Troop Skill」 Tired of monotonously attacking each other? Don't worry, your troops will have different skills! Try to use your skills to control the battlefield!
『Strategy』
「Troops Balance」 Want to win with fewer? Want to make surprise attacks on the enemy? All this will be achieved by your strategy! There are different attribute restraints among the troops, reasonable use of the mechanism, the next second, you will be able to turn the tide and change the situation of the battle!
「Terrain Factors」 Plains, hills, mountains, oceans...Different terrain will bring unexpected changes to the war! Choose to cross the mountains and catch the enemy by surprise; or choose to attack head-on and defeat the opponent on the plains, commander, please choose your marching route!
「Fortification」 Leading troops on the expedition will no longer be your only choice! Watchtowers, fortresses, walls, fences... a variety of fortifications allow you to choose from a wealth of war strategies! attack? Maybe wait a little longer! Consolidate your city, defend against the enemy's attack, and eliminate the enemy forces. The horn of counterattack will be sounded!
